recipesJson.name: Mango Man v2 (Live Mixing)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a super syrupy, sweet, and vivid Mango flavor.
Think of "Mango Man" on the shelf of your local vape store, this is probably what it would taste like.

Made on "Live Mixing: Mango Man"

reviews.text: Went through 30 ml in 4 days.  Great balance, the mango flavor has a "juicy" quality to it.  Gets even better at day 3 in my opinion (mixed at 70/30).
